ud8.2:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud8.2:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhu nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
ud8.2:1.4: Tedha bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbam cetaso samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
ud8.2:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
